Making Learning Work

About   |   Resources   |   Contact

Apps / Examples:

  • Qualt mobile training apps

Framework: Engagement

  • A. Astin (1984) - Student involvement: a developmental theory for higher education. Journal of College Student Personnel, 25 (4) (1984), pp. 297–308. Describes original definition of engagement.
  • G.D. Kuh. What student affairs professionals need to know about student engagement. Journal of College Student Development, 50 (6) (2009), pp. 683–706. Review of engagement in current context.
  • E.T. Pascarella, P.T. Terenzini. How college affects students: A third decade of research. Jossey-Bass, San Francisco, CA (2005). Link between engagement, development, and success.

Education and Incarceration

  • A Synthesis of Academic Interventions for Incarcerated Adolescents
  • Boston University Prison Education Program
  • The Prison Studies Project

Education and the Workforce

  • Apollo Group research on education and the workforce
  • Mark Peters and David Wessel, Wall Street Journal. "More men in their prime are out of work and at home" 6 Feb 2014 WSJ
  • I-BEST Program (Statewide program in Washington state)

Learning and Technology

  • Improving Adult Literacy Instruction: Options for Practice and Research, Alan Lesgold and Melissa Welch-Ross, eds. National Academy of Sciences. 2012. Chapter 6, "Technology to Promote Adult Literacy" explains research regarding adults learning through technology.
  • Ed Growth Advisers, funded by the Gates Foundation. Helpful in understanding the landscape and promise of adaptive learning technologies.
  • Games for a digital age: K-12 market map and investment analysis, The Joan Ganz Cooney Center at Sesame Workshop, Winter 2013.
  • "Tuning In To Local Labor Markets: Findings from the Sectoral Employment Impact Study". One the most-referenced studies showing the impact of focused “sectoral employment” programs.

Literacy

  • Yesterday’s Dropouts (Documentary)
  • Illiterate America by Jonathan Kozol
  • Literacy Volunteers and Advocates
  • Carlos Rosalio International Charter School
  • Literacy Volunteers of Massachusettes
  • Literacy Partners NYC

Print reports

  • "AP-NORC Low Wage Employer topline v5." National Survey of Employers on Low-Wage Workers.
  • "Low Wage Worker Topline v1". AP-NORC survey on the Employment Outlook of Low-Wage Workers in America.
  • Recovery: Job Growth and Education Requirements Through 2020. Addresses the education and skill requirements of future jobs.
